NVTA Direct To Consumer DTC may have a firestorm effect If Person A discovers she has a proclivity for breast cancer BRCA1 or BRCA2 mutations and needs to watch carefully she will alert her relatives And away we go There are other companies offering low priced tests like Color Genetics But you have to see your doctor FIRST and get him to order the tests DTC may be a large component of sales some day More immediately I am hoping for NonInvasive Prenatal Services to provide an upturn in tests and revenue NTRA a competitor reported 67M in revenue with 200000 tests in Q1 most of which are NIPS in nature
